idea-plugin.name: LhAndroidCodeGenerator
idea-plugin.description:
A plug-in for generating code.
A plug-in for generating the app template code of lhcredit financial planner. The first version is for lhcredit Android developers only. Usage: click the tools bar on the top toolbar of Android studio and click lhfplanner code generator to enter the class name. The plug-in generates files based on configuration options and configures them automatically
